México is a vibrant and bustling metropolis where ancient history and modern art collide. From the enticing ruins of Templo Mayor to the colorful streets of Coyoacán, the city is a treat to the senses. Indulge in world-class cuisines, explore lively markets, and learn about the rich culture that radiates from every corner.

Whether you're wandering through grand colonial plazas or discovering hidden art galleries, México City promises adventure at every turn. Explore the unforgettable city to create lasting memories today.

When is the Best Time to Book a Flight to México?

To find the best deals on flights to México, book your tickets in advance, probably around 45 to 60 days before your departure. Booking early will save you a ton of money and help you secure an affordable flight.

You can also book during the months of April to early June and September to November, as these are considered off-season months when you will get cheap flight tickets.

What are the Major Attractions in México?

Officially known as Ciudad de México, the city is a sprawling metropolis offering a blend of history, culture, and gastronomy, attracting millions of annual visitors. The city displays prominent architectural spaces with a delicious food scene.If you are in Mexico, make sure you explore the city’s best attractions including:

  • Museo Nacional de Antropología
  • Bosque de Chapultepec
  • Palacio de Bellas Artes
  • Zocalo
  • Museo Frida Kahlo
  • Templo Mayor
  • Museo de Arte Popular
  • Chapultepec Castle
  • Museo Casa Luis Barragán

Major International Airports of México

Traveling to Mexico City but don’t know which airport to fly to? The city has three major airports, and Mexico City International Airport is the primary international option. Here is a list of airports in the city:

  • Mexico City International Airport
  • Felipe Ángeles International Airport
  • Atizapán National Airport

You can also explore the entire Mexico, not just Mexico City. some alternate airports you can choose in Mexico include:

  • Cancún International Airport (CUN)
  • Guadalajara International Airport (GDL)
  • Monterrey International Airport (MTY)
  • Tijuana International Airport (TIJ)

How to Book a Flight To Mexico City with Traveloways?

Looking up cheap flights to Mexico City but stuck on the overbudget flights between the US and Mexico? Traveloways helps you explore the different options and secure a cheap fare deal in a few simple steps. Let’s check:

  • Head to the official webpage of Traveloways.
  • Tap on the 'Flight' option.
  • Enter your travel details as shown on the screen.
  • Click the submit button.
  • You will be navigated to a new page showing you available flights.
  • Compare and choose the option that suits your requirements.
  • Proceed further to pay and confirm your booking.

After the steps, we’ll send you a confirmation email with your ticket information and other details. Keep these details handy, as they’ll help you download your travel documents and check in later.

Cheap Flight Hacks for Affordable Travel to México City.

Though Traveloways can help you find some good deals in Mexico City, its always best to be prepared. You can follow these simple tips and tricks to see what you can do to get even more deals on flights:

  • Try to be as flexible as possible with your travel dates.
  • Set up flight alerts to monitor flight prices and book cheap tickets to your destination.
  • Use flight comparison tools to track prices and find the best available deals.
  • Avoid flying during peak seasons as ticket prices are quite high compared to other times.

Which are the Major Airlines Flying to México City?

Below is a list of some of the major airlines providing their services to México City.

  • Aeromexico
  • American Airlines
  • Delta Airlines
  • United Airlines
  • Volaris Airlines
  • VivaAerobus
